main event: An unidentified flying object was observed flying at a 20-degree elevation with a bright white light, making no sound, before disappearing into clouds.
interesting points: The sighting involved ground visual and radar observations., The object was flying on a heading of 315 degrees., Witnesses reported no radar contact with the object., The object was visible for approximately two minutes before being obscured by clouds., There were 4 confirmed witnesses to the sighting.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
